topics.body:
i was watching the best friends playing through Disaster: Day of Crisis
and it's amazing and over the top in the best ways
but i thought to myself, it didn't go over the top enough
i was hoping that the game would end with a badass fist fight on the boat
as it's held miles in the air by a tornado
and that the bad guys' didn't just have a nuke, but had like a device to cause natural disasters
